isCausedBy

public static boolean isCausedBy(Throwable thrown,
                                 Class<? extends Throwable> causeType)
Indicates if a thrown was caused by a Throwable of a specified type.

Parameters:
thrown - Throwable.
causeType - Type
Returns:
Returns true if the initial cause of the thrown was of type causeType.

initialCause

public static Throwable initialCause(Throwable thrown)
Gets the initial cause of a thrown.

Parameters:
thrown -
Returns:
Returns the Throwable that initiated the thrown.

causeInTheChain

public static <T extends Throwable> T causeInTheChain(Throwable thrown,
                                                      Class<T> causeType)
Gets the cause in the stack trace chain that belongs to a specified Throwable type.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of Throwable.
Parameters:
thrown - Thrown
causeType - Type of Throwable.
Returns:
Returns The throwable in the chain of causes of this Exception that belongs to the specified type. If there is no cause that belongs to the specified type, then returns null.

Returns a string with the stack trace of a Throwable

Returns:
the stack trace

notNull

public static <T> T notNull(T value)
Returns the value or throws a RuntimeException if it is null.

Parameters:
value -
Returns:
not null value or throw RuntimeException.

runtimeException

public static RuntimeException runtimeException(Throwable t)
Transforms a checked Throwable to an unchecked RuntimeException. If t is a RuntimeException the method will return it. If it an instance of any type of checked Exception the method will throw a RuntimeException with t as its cause.

Parameters:
t - Throwable that has to be transformed to an unchecked Exception.
Returns:
Returns t wrapped inside a runtime exception.

unwrap

public static Throwable unwrap(Throwable t)
Transforms a RuntimeException to its cause.

Parameters:
t - Throwable that has to be transformed.
Returns:
Returns t or its cause.
